name: Algorhythm (GenyaDev)
description:
Hello and welcome to Algorhythm! In this game, I, your friendly AI "It" will assist you in your rhythm game sessions by adjusting the difficulty based off your skill! The better you play, the harder it'll be!

PSSST.. you can import your own custom songs too... bet thatll be a popular feature

Controls

Use the Arrow Keys to move around the menu, as well as hit the rhythm buttons to play in-game. You can also use "H,J,K,L".

Art Credits (Thank you a million times!):

- Revolutionary Goose - AI fella

- Milemations - Cover art

-hecksanontagon - Cover art

Hope you have fun!! <3
